tweet.text: Between the outbreak of WWI in August 1914 and U.S. entry into the war as a belligerent in April 1917, Department of State officials took on unprecedented responsibilities that forever changed the practice of U.S. diplomacy. Read the story here: https://t.co/k59pQNw2Yw
